subject: Olympic Games
Track and Field
Running
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Emil Zatopek won the 5,000 and 10,000 meters and the marathon — all in record times — at the 1952 Olympics in Helsinki, Finland.
snippet: Emil Zatopek won the 5,000 and 10,000 meters and the marathon — all in record times — at the 1952 Olympics in Helsinki, Finland.
